metadata.title: V.I.P.JEANS Women's Denim Shorts Bermuda ripped juniors fit
features: SEXY CASUAL OR BOTH: Our Denim Overalls, Jumpsuits and Rompers are timeless classics. Perfect stretchy soft and comfortable slim fitting skinny overall shorts or ankle jeans. Choose Overall washes of Dark Antique Blue or Light Acid Bleach.

CUFFED ANKLE OR SHORT: Wear with pumps, stylish heels or sexy booties. This multifunction jean features our pressed short cuff or long ankle design. Simply fold up or down to achieve the look and style you are looking for. The cuff will hug your ankle and look absolutely perfect.

COMFORT FIT OVERALLS: Stay warm with our Machine wash 98% Cotton and 2% Spandex denim fabric blend. You will love how cute you look in our cotton stretch zipper jeans regardless of your body type. Cute and flattering denim overalls.

ALL ABOUT FREE RETURNS:  Even if tags removed or exceeded the 30 day policy. Contact us prior to leaving a feedback or product review and we will provide FREE prepaid return label. Known for quality durable Jeans for women, girls, teens and kids worldwide. Large retailers rely on our jeans  to deliver a great fit and a value to their customers. Full year replacement direct from seller.
description: CG Collection from VIP Jeans is a premier fast fashion denim for Women Juniors. Slim fitting cute skinny jeans are soft and comfy at a great low price and easy return free labels.
